I'm Kelly Wright. I was an analytical chemist for 9 years, but am transitioning to web development. My husband (Brian) and I have a daughter (Kaitlyn). Before Kaitlyn, I enjoyed whitewater kayaking, martial arts, skiing and snowboarding. Now, I enjoy spending time with Kaitlyn, reading, quilting, and going to Bible study. In my career, I want to utilize technical skills, solve problems, and incorporate creativity and innovation.
